EmailTemplate.subject: Make Laminating Easy with FOTON®30
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse?Ntt=foton30&Ntk=All&soffer=false?cmp=EBNOVACCO19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM%20Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/product/3381639080_GBC_Foton_30_Automatic_Laminator.aspx?cmp=EBNOVACCO19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Automatically feeds, laminates, and trims 30 documents at a time with the touch of a button. No more time wasted loading pouches and feeding them one by one into a laminator. <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/product/3381639080_GBC_Foton_30_Automatic_Laminator.aspx?cmp=EBNOVACCO19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> LEARN MORE <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/product/3381639080_GBC_Foton_30_Automatic_Laminator.aspx?cmp=EBNOVACCO19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special-order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
